ygData.subject: RE: Crafted items (some idiot)
ygData.msgSnippet: The Medal of Merit quest is from Surefall Glade behind the Rangers cabin. I think the Drosco quest gets a similar +5 charisma item as well. Belgarth ...
ygData.messageBody:
The Medal of Merit quest is from Surefall Glade
behind the Rangers cabin. I think the Drosco quest
gets a similar +5 charisma item as well.

Belgarth

--- Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...> wrote:
> From: Joel Thronburg <jthronburg@...>
>
> Medal of Merit comes from a Qeynos Quest. Not sure
> which one though(could
> be Drosco the zombie that drops this down the
> sewers). I bought the item
> off a guy for 5pp a while back though. Opallines
> come off the Barkeep in
> Unrest. Crude Stein comes off Ogre Bouncers in
> Feerrot. You can pick em up
> for about 100pp off players though.
>
